attachments.title: Remain third character(`z`) of listchars'tab(`tab:xy[z]`) on breakindenting first line by rbtnn 路 Pull Request #5165 路 vim/vim
attachments.text: to reproduce >gvim -N -u NONE :set breakindent list listchars=tab:<-> showbreak=+++ :call setline(1, &quot;\t&quot; . repeat(&#39;a&#39;, 300)) before after I&#39;ll add this test. Plea...
